test case:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<project name="project" default="default">
	<target name="s"></target>
	
    <target name="default" unless="ant.file" if="ant.file.project">
        <echo>Skeleton</echo>
    	<echo>${arg1}</echo>

    </target>
</project>

Marking occurrences turned on
Blows up finding occurrences of the target named "s"

Fixed in the AntTargetNode to only look for property occurrences if the identifier is a property identifier.

Please verify Kevin.
*** Bug 103985 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
